verbose_text: Contrary to CYFIP1 upregulation, its loss in vivo, upon conditional knockout in neocortical principal cells, increases expression of postsynaptic GABA A receptor beta2/3-subunits and neuroligin 3, enhancing synaptic inhibition.
evidence: expression of postsynaptic GABA A  receptor beta2/3-subunits and neuroligin 3
